Title: Where are the Pools
Description:
Perhaps these mogu know where the pools are.

Our scouts have reported seeing a commander along the southern side of the Ruins of Dojan.

Kill him and take whatever information he is carrying. They should lead you to the pool.
CompletionText:
<You sense the presence of Lorekeeper Vaeldrin, then hear his voice within your mind.>

Hmm. I'm still not sure about these references to "torture" regarding the Pools of Youth.
RewardText:
Well done, $p. Hmm, it looks like the mogu are here to collect ancient relics and weapons from their forgotten dynasty. That is a problem we can face later though.

Ah! Here is a reference to the Pools of Youth.
